weekly_top_story.headline: OSF HealthCare to Transition Obstetrics and ICU Services to Saint Elizabeth Medical Center in Peru, Illinois
weekly_top_story.summary: OSF HealthCare will consolidate inpatient OB and ICU services from Ottawa to Peru starting December 3, 2025, enhancing regional care delivery and supporting a sustainable healthcare model in the I-80 region.

stories.headline: Healthcare Payers Transformation Assembly Begins in Nashville to Address Industry Challenges
stories.summary: The December 2-3, 2025 Healthcare Payers Transformation Assembly kicked off in Nashville, focusing on digital transformation, financial risk mitigation, and the evolving healthcare insurance landscape.

stories.headline: Integra LifeSciences CEO and CFO to Present at Citi 2025 Global Healthcare Conference
stories.summary: Integra LifeSciences announced its top executives will present on December 3, 2025, highlighting developments at this leading medical technology company's investor event.
